channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Atomic-level mechanism in polycrystalline materials
item.description: Researchers show that for the first time they have achieved atomic-scale observations of grain rotation in polycrystalline materials. Using state-of-t...

item.title: MRR: Taking a groundbreaking technology from basic research to commercialization

item.title: Will AI tools revolutionize public health? Not if they continue following old patterns, researchers argue
item.description: A new article shares findings from an extensive literature analysis of AI's current trajectory in health care.

item.title: Holographic 3D printing has the potential to revolutionize multiple industries
item.description: Researchers have developed a novel method of 3D printing that uses acoustic holograms. The process is called holographic direct sound printing (HDSP)....

item.title: Solar-powered desalination system requires no extra batteries
